headline: Short-Term US Bonds Rise as Traders Boost Bets on 2025 Rate Cuts

headline: M&A is slowing in US but accelerating worldwide during new Trump era
summary: US M&A is having its slowest start to a year since 2023, while deal volume outside the US soars to its best result since 2022.

headline: Sony Group shares soar as it’s said to consider chip spinoff
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Sony Group Corp. shares surged after people familiar with the matter said it is mulling spinning off its semiconductor unit, raising expectations that such a move would unlock value in the Japanese entertainment and electronics company.
